channel.title: Port Forwarding Problem
channel.description: Hello, This is lyon930 and I am having a problem. I have recently switched my linksys for a telus 2 wire which has a router and wireless built in. But when i go to: "Start" ... "run" ... Type:"CMD" and i get all the info i need to forward port (gateway default). Wehn i open Explorer and paste it into internet explorer text box and hit enter it comes up with the computers and laptops that are active in my house. I need help forwarding the port ........... if you can help please send a personal message or e-mail me at daveylyon@hotmail.com Much appreciated, Lyon930

item.title: Port Forwarding Problem
item.dc:creator: @lyon930 lyon930
item.description:
@lyon930 wrote:

Hello,
This is lyon930 and I am having a problem. I have recently switched my linksys for a telus 2 wire which has a router and wireless built in. But when i go to: “Start” … “run” … Type:“CMD” and i get all the info i need to forward port (gateway default). Wehn i open Explorer and paste it into internet explorer text box and hit enter it comes up with the computers and laptops that are active in my house. I need help forwarding the port … if you can help please send a personal message or e-mail me at daveylyon@hotmail.com
Much appreciated, Lyon930
